SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces

Interface LobbyGameListsController

All Superinterfaces:
GameList, MalevolentPlayerManager, Remote, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
LobbyGameListsController
public interface LobbyGameListsController extends GameList, MalevolentPlayerManager, Serializable, Remote
Interface that defines the methods of the controller of the lobby list and of the game list and manage the players interaction with the server

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createLobby(String nickname, String gameName, int maxPlayerCount, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
    This method is used to create a lobby in the lobby list If the lobby name is already taken, the player is prompted to choose another one If the player is already in a lobby or a game, the player is considered malevolent
    void
    joinLobby(String nickname, String lobbyName, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
    This method is used to join a lobby in the lobby list If the lobby name is not in the lobby list, the player is prompted to choose another one If the player is already in a lobby or a game, the player is considered malevolent If the lobby is full before joining, the player is prompted to choose another one If the lobby is full after joining, the game starts
    void
    leave(String nickname)
    This method is used to leave from the lobby or game List; from whichever state the player is in, it moves him back to the main menu
    void
    leaveLobby(String nickname)
    This method is used to leave the lobby the player is in and moves him back to the lobbyList If the player is not in a lobby, the player is considered malevolent
    boolean
    login(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver controllerReceiver)
    Logs a player in the Lobby and Game List If the nickname is already in use, the player is prompted to choose another one If the nickname is already in a game, the player is reconnected to the game If the nickname is not in a game, the player is reconnected to the lobby List where he can create or join a lobby

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.GameList

    deleteGame

    Methods inherited from interface it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces.MalevolentPlayerManager

    manageMalevolentPlayer

  • Method Details

    • login

      boolean login(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver controllerReceiver)
      Logs a player in the Lobby and Game List If the nickname is already in use, the player is prompted to choose another one If the nickname is already in a game, the player is reconnected to the game If the nickname is not in a game, the player is reconnected to the lobby List where he can create or join a lobby
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player
      view - the view of the player
      controllerReceiver - the controller receiver of the player used to set the gameController if the player is in a game
      Returns:
      true if the player is successfully logged in, false otherwise

    • createLobby

      void createLobby(String nickname, String gameName, int maxPlayerCount, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
      This method is used to create a lobby in the lobby list If the lobby name is already taken, the player is prompted to choose another one If the player is already in a lobby or a game, the player is considered malevolent
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player creating the lobby
      gameName - the name of the lobby
      maxPlayerCount - the maximum number of players that can join the lobby
      gameReceiver - the game controller receiver of the player

    • joinLobby

      void joinLobby(String nickname, String lobbyName, GameControllerReceiver gameReceiver)
      This method is used to join a lobby in the lobby list If the lobby name is not in the lobby list, the player is prompted to choose another one If the player is already in a lobby or a game, the player is considered malevolent If the lobby is full before joining, the player is prompted to choose another one If the lobby is full after joining, the game starts
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player joining the lobby
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby to join
      gameReceiver - the game controller receiver of the player

    • leave

      void leave(String nickname)
      This method is used to leave from the lobby or game List; from whichever state the player is in, it moves him back to the main menu
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player leaving

    • leaveLobby

      void leaveLobby(String nickname)
      This method is used to leave the lobby the player is in and moves him back to the lobbyList If the player is not in a lobby, the player is considered malevolent
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player leaving the lobby
